description: This view contains daily aggregations on feature usage for key features within the organization (Frontiers), filtered to most recent date

schema.name: date
schema.description: Date partition

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The Samsara cloud dashboard ID that the data belongs to

schema.name: org_name
schema.description: Name of the organization

schema.name: org_category
schema.description: Classification of org

schema.name: account_arr_segment
schema.description: ARR for the account of the organization

schema.name: account_size_segment_name
schema.description: Size of the account for the organization

schema.name: account_billing_country
schema.description: Billing country associated with the organization

schema.name: region
schema.description: Cloud region of the organization

schema.name: sam_number
schema.description: Samnumber is a unique id that ties customer accounts together in Netsuite, Salesforce, and Samsara cloud dashboard.

schema.name: account_id
schema.description: ID of account

schema.name: account_name
schema.description: Name of account

schema.name: feature
schema.description: Name of the feature being tracked

schema.name: enabled
schema.description: Whether the org is enabled for the given feature or not

schema.name: usage_weekly
schema.description: Usage stats in last 7 days

schema.name: usage_monthly
schema.description: Usage stats in last 28 days

schema.name: usage_prior_month
schema.description: Usage stats in prior 28 days

schema.name: usage_weekly_prior_month
schema.description: Usage stats in the 7 days prior to the last 28 days

schema.name: daily_active_user
schema.description: Active users in last day of feature

schema.name: daily_enabled_users
schema.description: Users who had access in last day of feature

schema.name: weekly_active_users
schema.description: Active users in last 7 days of feature

schema.name: weekly_enabled_users
schema.description: Users who had access in last 7 days of feature

schema.name: monthly_active_users
schema.description: Active users in last 28 days of feature

schema.name: monthly_enabled_users
schema.description: Users who had access in last 28 days of feature

schema.name: org_active_day
schema.description: Whether org has used feature on the day or not

schema.name: org_active_week
schema.description: Whether org has used feature in last 7 days or not

schema.name: org_active_week_prior_month
schema.description: Whether org has used feature in the week 28 days ago or not

schema.name: org_active_month
schema.description: Whether org has used feature in last 28 days or not

schema.name: org_active_prior_month
schema.description: Whether org has used feature in 28 days prior to the last 28 days or not
